statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: There is a complete binary tree with N nodes.The subtree of the node i has Ai nodes.How many distinct numbers are there of Ai?

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases, no more than 1000 cases.
For each case contains a single integer N on a line.$(1\leq N\leq {10}^{18})$

statement.title: Output
statement.content: The output of each case will be a single integer on a line:the number of subtrees that contain different nodes.
